headline: How Ralph Lauren Turned Nostalgia Into Momentum
summary: At 86, Ralph Lauren isn’t coasting on legacy—he’s still shaping the cultural and commercial conversation.

raw.headline: How Ralph Lauren Turned Nostalgia Into Momentum
raw.summary: At 86, Ralph Lauren isn’t coasting on legacy—he’s still shaping the cultural and commercial conversation.

headline: Ralph Lauren lifts FY26 outlook following strong holiday sales growth
summary: Ralph Lauren has revised its full-year outlook for fiscal 2026 (FY26), projecting higher revenue and operating margins following what it described as “strong, high-quality growth” across regions and consumer segments during the holiday period.

raw.headline: Ralph Lauren lifts FY26 outlook following strong holiday sales growth
